name: MyRiseRitual
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: This program was created to help develop a practice of rising well. So much of our day starts in the first few minutes of the day. However, if you control those minutes, are mindful with them that mindfulness can guide the rest of your day, and eventually your life.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
